titleStmt.title: An excellent speech spoken by His Highness Iames Duke of Yorke to England's renowned generall, His Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax at the King's Majesties royall conrt [sic] at Causam : together with His Excellencies answer ... : also the chiefe heads of the armies new declaration concerning the king, parliament and kingdome : with a message from the generall to the citizens of London.

An excellent speech spoken by His Highness Iames Duke of Yorke to England's renowned generall, His Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax at the King's Majesties royall conrt [sic] at Causam : together with His Excellencies answer ... : also the chiefe heads of the armies new declaration concerning the king, parliament and kingdome : with a message from the generall to the citizens of London.
titleStmt.author: James II, King of England, 1633-1701.
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: for Edward Benington, for the publike use of Great Brittain,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.

person.persName: the publike use of Great Brittain
